title: New Orleans French Quarter Glamour Along Bourbon Street with Daily Breakfast & Daily Dining Credit
description:
Located on the world-famous Bourbon Street in New Orleans is The Royal Sonesta New Orleans, a landmark hotel opened in 1969. Here, time comes to a halt and old-world French Quarter elegance takes over. The hotel is located just steps from the city's best restaurants, bars and entertainment venues, so you'll never run out of things to do.

Wrought iron balconies look out over vibrant New Orleans streets (selected rooms only), while inside incredible facilities including five restaurants and bars will undoubtedly keep nights fun-filled. Catch a live jazz performance with a cocktail in hand onsite at The Jazz Playhouse, experience world-class cuisine at Restaurant R'evolution and enjoy a tipple or two at Le Booze.
offer_address: 300 Bourbon St, New Orleans, Louisiana 70130, United States

title: Chic W New Orleans Stay in the French Quarter with Dining & Outdoor Pool
description: Feel right at home within the vibrant culture of the Big Easy at the ultra-chic W New Orleans - French Quarter. Finding its home in the heart of the city's most iconic district, this hotel offers a unique blend of Southern charm and contemporary luxury. Step out and explore the historic Jackson Square, the lively jazz clubs on Bourbon Street, and the exquisite Creole cuisine at world-renowned restaurants. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's lush courtyard, sip a Sazerac by the pool, and soak up the authentic New Orleans atmosphere in the hotel's own stylish kitchen and bar.
offer_address: 316 Chartres St, New Orleans, LA 70130, United States

title: New Orleans Westin Riverside Stay near Iconic French Quarter with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Cocktails, jazz and cuisine to rival any in the world: if you’ve been waiting for the perfect opportunity to fall in love with the Big Easy, this chic hotel delivers. Located within an easy stroll of the historic French Quarter and its iconic Bourbon Street, The Westin New Orleans is close to the action but tucked enough away that you’ll be able to enjoy The Westin’s signature comforts. After days spent exploring NOLA’s best, return to classic cocktails - and magnificent views over the Mississippi River - at Observatory Eleven, or classic Cajun fare at Bistro at the Bend.

With destination fees included in your package, you’ll be all set to take advantage of The Westin New Orleans' extensive list of perks, including daily US$30 dining credit per package, iconic city experiences - including ghost and garden district tours - and more.
offer_address: 100 Iberville St, New Orleans, Louisiana, 70130, United States

title: Westin New Orleans French Quarter Luxury with Iconic Mississippi River Views
description: Experience the vibrant soul of the Big Easy at The Westin New Orleans, a luxurious retreat nestled on the edge of the historic French Quarter. This chic hotel offers an unrivalled location, steps away from the legendary Bourbon Street, the Mississippi River, and the world-renowned Harrah's Casino. After a day of exploration, unwind with a delicious cocktail at Observatory Eleven high above the city's energetic pulse. Enjoy a moment pumping some iron in the fully-equipped fitness centre before settling in for an evening of well deserved riverside dining at Bistro at the Bend.
offer_address: 100 Iberville St, New Orleans, Louisiana, 70130, United States

title: New Orleans Ritz-Carlton Decadence in Historic Beaux-Arts Mansion One Block from Bourbon Street
offer_address: 921 Canal St, New Orleans, LA 70112, United States

title: New Orleans Heritage Glamour near French Quarter & Bourbon Street with Daily Breakfast
description:
Formerly the Omni Riverfront New Orleans, this hotel has undergone an exciting transformation to emerge as the proudly independent The Riverfront Hotel New Orleans. Positioned just a short stroll from the Mississippi River, this charming escape places you at the heart of New Orleans’ soulful spirit. Nestled in the historic Warehouse District, you're moments from the French Quarter - where jazz clubs pulse and Bourbon Street beckons with its legendary energy.

After a day soaking in the city’s magic, return to Fulton St. Bistro & Bar for a Parisian-style setting with a modern take on bold Louisiana flavours. Sip a classic Sazerac, wander down Royal Street and let the iron-laced balconies, vibrant galleries and roaming brass bands guide your next adventure. As night falls, meander through Fulton Alley - home to boutique bowling lanes, cozy outdoor patios and the kind of eclectic nightlife only locals know best.
offer_address: 701 Convention Center Boulevard, New Orleans, Louisiana 70130, United States

title: Glamourous New Orleans Stay near French Quarter with Three Bars & Restaurants
description: Be serenaded by the soulful heritage of New Orleans at the Kimpton Hotel Fontenot, an IHG Hotel, a glamourous urban haven just minutes from the famed French Quarter. Savour hearty dishes at the King Brasserie, slip under the sultry ambiance of the Peacock Room bar, and jazz up your morning coffee at Gospel Coffee and Boozy Treats. Or explore the rich tapestry of the area, from the vibrant music scene and historic architecture to the renowned cultural landmarks, all just moments away.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Fontenot, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 501 Tchoupitoulas Street, New Orleans, Louisiana 70130, United States

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo New Orleans French Quarter
title: Stylish New Orleans Stay in French Quarter with Onsite Restaurant
description: Find your feet in New Orleans with a stay at Hotel Indigo New Orleans - French Quarter, an IHG Hotel. Inspired by the colour, culture and costuming of this vibrant city, this chic hotel unites style and comfort, with an enviable location in the heart of the French Quarter. Just a stone's throw from historic Bourbon Street, enjoy easy access to some of the city's best sights, before returning to the hotel to feast on soulful Cajun cuisine at Common Interest.
location_description: Hotel Indigo New Orleans - French Quarter, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 705 Common Street, New Orleans, Lousiana 70130, United States

title: Boutique New Orleans Escape near the Iconic French Quarter
description:
Embrace New Orleans' energy from International House - a boutique hotel positioned on the fringes of the vibrant French Quarter. Authentic, timeless and with a splash of retro flair, this NOLA oasis offers everything you need for an unforgettable Southern escape. Unwind with a homegrown blood-orange cocktail in the luxe Loa lobby bar, refresh with lemon water from the 24-hour lobby service or admire eclectic art in the second-floor gallery, which houses the USA's largest Banksy mural.

When you're ready to explore, hop on one of the hotel's retro-cruisers and peddle along the Mississippi riverfront or take the 10-minute stroll to lively Bourbon Street, where the scent of Cajun fare wafts along pavements packed with lively jazz clubs and cocktail bars.
offer_address: 221 Camp St, New Orleans, LA 70130, United States

title: New Orleans French Quarter Glamour Moments from Bourbon Street with Rooftop Pool
description:
Embrace New Orleans' charm and southern hospitality at this elegant hotel, ideally positioned in the heart of the vibrant French Quarter. Authentic, timeless and with a splash of modern flair, this oasis offers everything you need for an unforgettable escape. Savour the local flavours at the Rib Room restaurant, refresh with a cocktail at Touche Bar or ascend to the rooftop pool, offering panoramic views of the Mississippi River.

When you're ready to explore, stroll along the riverfront or take the 10-minute stroll to lively Bourbon Street, where the scent of Cajun fare wafts along pavements packed with lively jazz clubs and cocktail bars.
offer_address: 621 St. Louis Street, New Orleans, Louisiana 70130, USA

title: Upscale New Orleans Riverfront Escape near Arts District & Mississippi River with Onsite Cocktail Bar
description:
Get a real taste of southern hospitality and a warm welcome at this well-appointed New Orleans escape. Ideally situated between the popular French Quarter and the lively Arts District, this stay gives guests a taste of New Orleans' charm. Enjoy a modern take on classic Sazerac cocktails and authentic Creole-inspired cuisine at the Fulton St. Bistro & Bar.

Wander around Woldenberg Park and take in the sights and sounds of the Mississippi River, or hop on the Canal Street Ferry for sweeping views in a relaxed setting. After a day of exploring, head back to one of the hotel's many modern rooms to unwind in style.
offer_address: 701 Convention Center Boulevard, New Orleans, Louisiana 70130, USA

title: Culturally Rich Escape in New Orleans near Iconic French Quarter
description: Immerse yourself in the intoxicating rhythm of New Orleans with a stay at InterContinental New Orleans, an IHG Hotel. Nestled on the historic St. Charles Avenue, this hotel offers a gateway to the vibrant French Quarter and the picturesque Garden District. Indulge in the tantalising flavours of Creole cuisine at onsite Trenasse restaurant, sip on classic cocktails at Pete's or soak up cityscape views from the rooftop pool. Venture beyond the hotel to discover the lively Bourbon Street, the historic Jackson Square and the bustling French Market
location_description: InterContinental New Orleans, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 444 St Charles Avenue, New Orleans, Louisiana 70130, United States

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza New Orleans French Quarter
title: Central New Orleans Escape With Rooftop Pool, Steps Away From Bourbon Street
description: Embrace the vibrant spirit of the Big Easy with a stay at Crowne Plaza New Orleans French Quarter - Astor, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly positioned on the edge of the historic French Quarter, you're steps away from the pulsating energy of Bourbon Street, the gastronomic delights of Royal Street, and the iconic Jackson Square. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's outdoor pool or enjoy Creole-inspired cuisine at the onsite restaurant, Bourbon House. An embodiment of the true spirit of New Orleans, the hotel offers world-class amenities, proximity to the happening places, and the best of the best hospitality.
location_description: Crowne Plaza New Orleans French Qtr - Astor, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 739 Canal Street At Bourbon, New Orleans, Los Angeles, 70130 United States

title: Historic 1920s New Orleans Escape Moments from the French Quarter
description:
Restored to its exquisite 1920s grandeur, Nopsi Hotel, New Orleans will transport you to the glamorous roaring twenties from the moment you're escorted inside by the charming doorman. While this hotel has now been declared a historic landmark, it offers unparalleled modern facilities, including a rooftop swimming pool framed by cabanas, a sophisticated 'Above the Grid' rooftop bar and an incredible restaurant serving up handmade pizzas and classic Gulf Coast seafood.

When you're not living a life of luxury within the confines of this heritage masterpiece, the delights of Bourbon Street are at your doorstep, while the Warehouse/Arts Districts are easily walkable. The French Quarter beckons a mere three blocks away, where you'll discover a reimagined French Market, modern boutiques and artisan cocktail bars in between antique stores and thriving restaurants.
offer_address: 317 Baronne St, New Orleans, LA 70112, United States
